text: Tomara kitabadharidera sathe tarka-bitarka karabe na, kintu uttama panthaya; tabe tadera sathe naya, yara tadera madhye be-inasapha. Ebam bala, amadera prati o tomadera prati ya nayila kara hayeche, tate amara bisbasa sthapana karechi. Amadera upasya o tomadera upasya eka'i ebam amara tamra'i ajnabaha.
